translations: 改写（rewrite 的过去分词形式）；重写

sentences.sentence: This essay will have to be completely rewritten.
As more and more examples come to light and modern genetics enters the scene, that principle is having to be rewritten.
sentences.translation: 随着越来越多的案例浮出水面，随着现代遗传学进入人们的视野，这一原则不得不被改写。
我们已经重新定义了所有的规则。
